definitions:
(transitive) to understand; to comprehend

Eu compreendo seus motivos, mas eles não justificam seus atos.

I understand your reasons, but they don't justify your acts.

(transitive) to understand; to get (to know how a person feels)

Meus pais nunca me compreenderam.

My parents never understood me.

(transitive) to include; to encompass; to comprise

Esta lista compreende todos os ingredientes para o bolo de aniversário.

This list includes all the ingredients for the birthday's cake.
first-person singular (eu) personal infinitive of compreender
third-person singular (ele and ela, also used with você and others) personal infinitive of compreender
first-person singular (eu) future subjunctive of compreender
third-person singular (ele and ela, also used with você and others) future subjunctive of compreender
description: compreender (first-person singular present indicative compreendo, past participle compreendido)
